|stockos = |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Smart switch, 4x SFP/RJ45 Combo ports, SNMP, LACP, MSTP, RSTP, heatsink, metal case |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = 440 x 210 x 44 mm |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== {{See also|D-Link DGS-1210-28 rev F1|D-Link DGS series}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://svanheule.net/switches/dgs-1210_series ''D-Link DGS-1210'' series on '''svanheule''' wiki] 
Revision	Port variants			Hardware platform

A1		10P, 16, 24, 48			Marvell
B1		10P, 20, 28(P), 52		Marvell
C1		10(P), 20, 28(P), 52(P/MP)	Broadcom
F1		10(P/MP), 26, 28(P/MP), 52(MP)	Realtek RTL838x
G1		8P, 10, 16, 24(P), 48		Realtek RTL838x
R1		10(P/MP),26,28(P/MP),52(MP/MPP)	32MB/256MB
